# City Council

 

140 S 3rd Street Central Point OR 97502

[Directions](https://www.google.com/maps/place/140+S+3rd+Street+Central+Point+OR+97502)

Physical Address:View Map

Central Point, OR 97502

Phone:

541-664-3321 Ext. 203
